text: Wo yi [zai jinshi] wei tamen paile xuduo mi ban [emo], naxie mi ban yi tamen shengqian [zai jinshi shenghuo zhong zuo'e] he si hou [bu xinyang qingsuan he fuhuo deng] de shi mihuo tamen. Tamen ying shou xingfa de panjue, youru zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de qunti suo shou de panjue yiyang. Tamen que shi sunshi zhe.
